item.title: Alie add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Alie add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Freedom lies in being bold." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Alie add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Alie add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Alie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Alie add a quote by Jiddu Krishnamurti
item.description: "You must understand the whole of life, not just one little part of it. That is why you must read, that is why you must look at the skies, that is why you must sing, and dance, and write poems, and suffer, and understand, for all that is life." -- Jiddu Krishnamurti

item.title: Alie add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Never think that war, no matter how necessary, nor how justified, is not a crime." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Alie add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Perhaps all the dragons in our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us act, just once, with beauty and courage. Perhaps everything that frightens us is, in its deepest essence, something helpless that wants our love." -- Rainer Maria Rilke
